content.json:
## Stale Device Sweep - Run History

Monitor your Azure Function runs, configuration, and actions taken.

---
### Recent Function Runs
Shows all executions with duration, status, and configuration.

content.query:
let runs = AppRequests
| where Name has "StaleDeviceSweep"
| project TimeGenerated, OperationId, Name, Success, DurationMs, ResultCode;

let configs = AppTraces
| where Message has "CFG "
| extend cfg = parse_json(substring(Message, indexof(Message, "CFG ") + 4))
| project OperationId,
    mode = tostring(cfg.mode),
    includeIntune = tobool(cfg.includeIntune),
    staleDays = toint(cfg.staleDays);

let results = AppTraces
| where Message has "RESULT "
| extend result = parse_json(substring(Message, indexof(Message, "RESULT ") + 7))
| project OperationId,
    totalDevices = toint(result.totalDevices),
    activeCount = toint(result.activeCount),
    staleCount = toint(result.staleCount),
    plannedActions = toint(result.plannedActions),
    executedActions = toint(result.executedActions);

runs
| join kind=leftouter configs on OperationId
| join kind=leftouter results on OperationId
| project 
    TimeGenerated,
    ['Duration (s)'] = round(DurationMs / 1000, 1),
    Success,
    Mode = mode,
    ['Intune'] = includeIntune,
    ['Stale Days'] = staleDays,
    ['Total Devices'] = totalDevices,
    ['Active'] = activeCount,
    ['Stale'] = staleCount,
    ['Planned Actions'] = plannedActions,
    ['Executed Actions'] = executedActions,
    OperationId
| order by TimeGenerated desc

content.json:
---
### Device Classification Trends
Shows how device counts have changed over time.

content.query:
let runs = AppRequests
| where Name has "StaleDeviceSweep"
| project TimeGenerated, OperationId;

let results = AppTraces
| where Message has "RESULT "
| extend result = parse_json(substring(Message, indexof(Message, "RESULT ") + 7))
| project OperationId,
    totalDevices = toint(result.totalDevices),
    activeCount = toint(result.activeCount),
    staleCount = toint(result.staleCount),
    staleNoSignInCount = toint(result.staleNoSignInCount),
    unknownCount = toint(result.unknownCount);

runs
| join kind=inner results on OperationId
| project TimeGenerated, activeCount, staleCount, staleNoSignInCount, unknownCount
| order by TimeGenerated asc

content.json:
---
### Device Distribution (Latest Run)
Breakdown of device classifications from the most recent execution.

content.query:
let latestRun = AppRequests
| where Name has "StaleDeviceSweep"
| top 1 by TimeGenerated desc
| project OperationId;

AppTraces
| where OperationId in (latestRun)
| where Message has "RESULT "
| extend result = parse_json(substring(Message, indexof(Message, "RESULT ") + 7))
| project 
    Active = toint(result.activeCount),
    Stale = toint(result.staleCount),
    StaleNoSignIn = toint(result.staleNoSignInCount),
    Unknown = toint(result.unknownCount)
| extend temp = 1
| project Classification = pack_array('Active', 'Stale', 'Stale (No Sign-In)', 'Unknown'), Count = pack_array(Active, Stale, StaleNoSignIn, Unknown)
| mv-expand Classification to typeof(string), Count to typeof(int)

content.json:
---
### Actions Executed Over Time
Trend of actions taken across all runs.

content.query:
let runs = AppRequests
| where Name has "StaleDeviceSweep"
| project TimeGenerated, OperationId;

let results = AppTraces
| where Message has "RESULT "
| extend result = parse_json(substring(Message, indexof(Message, "RESULT ") + 7))
| extend actionBreakdown = result.actionBreakdown
| project OperationId,
    disable = toint(actionBreakdown.disable),
    tag = toint(actionBreakdown.tag),
    retire = toint(actionBreakdown.retire),
    wipe = toint(actionBreakdown.wipe),
    delete = toint(actionBreakdown["delete"]);

runs
| join kind=inner results on OperationId
| project TimeGenerated, disable, tag, retire, wipe, delete
| order by TimeGenerated asc

content.json:
---
### Errors
Any exceptions or errors from recent runs. Note: 404 blob errors are excluded as they are expected when checking if output blobs exist before creation.

content.query:
let targetOps = AppRequests
| where Name has "StaleDeviceSweep"
| project OperationId;

let exceptions = AppExceptions
| where OperationId in (targetOps)
| project TimeGenerated, Type = "Exception", SeverityLevel, Message = substring(tostring(OuterMessage), 0, 200), OperationId;

let errors = AppTraces
| where OperationId in (targetOps)
| where SeverityLevel >= 3 or Message has "Error" or Message has "Failed"
// Exclude expected 404 blob not found errors (Azure Functions checks blob existence before creation)
| where Message !contains "404 The specified blob does not exist"
| project TimeGenerated, Type = "Error", SeverityLevel, Message = substring(Message, 0, 200), OperationId;

union exceptions, errors
| order by TimeGenerated desc

content.json:
---
### Performance Metrics
Function execution duration and success rate.

content.query:
AppRequests
| where Name has "StaleDeviceSweep"
| summarize 
    TotalRuns = count(),
    SuccessRate = round(100.0 * countif(Success == true) / count(), 1),
    AvgDuration = round(avg(DurationMs) / 1000, 1),
    MaxDuration = round(max(DurationMs) / 1000, 1)
| project Metric = pack_array('Total Runs', 'Success Rate %', 'Avg Duration (s)', 'Max Duration (s)'), Value = pack_array(TotalRuns, SuccessRate, AvgDuration, MaxDuration)
| mv-expand Metric to typeof(string), Value to typeof(real)
